UPW In and Outbound train Halted

Inbound and outbound train movement is halted near GENEVA due to freight train striking a pedestrian.  Customers should expect extensive delays.  Updates will be provided.  Please visit metra.com for more information.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN 2153, Stopped, Mechanical

Your attention please, 2153 scheduled to arrive Fox Lake at 10:12 pm is on the move operating 40 to 45 minutes behind schedule due to an earlier mechanical failure on 2147. We apologize for any inconvenience. Thank you for your patience.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Train 2156 , Extensive Delay
Train #2156 , scheduled to depart Fox Lake at 08:40 PM, is on the move with an extensive delay due to a Mechanical Failure. Metra will provide further updates with this train.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert RI - Construction begins April 21 at 103rd Street Washington Heights Station.
Metra forces will begin work Friday, April 21 on a major rehab project at the 103rd Street/Washington Heights Station on the Rock Island Line, for more informaiton click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - Saturday 5/6 & Sunday 5/7, Metra Electric trains at Millennium station will board from tracks 11, 12, and 13 from 7a-5p

Saturday, May 6 and Sunday, May 7, trains will not have access to their normal boarding platforms at Millennium station due to track maintenance on the lower level between the hours of 7:00 AM and 5:00 PM.  Metra Electric trains will arrive and depart from the South Shore NICTD upper level depot tracks #11, #12, and #13 during this time. Please listen to station announcements for boarding information or see a Metra Attendant if you have any questions.

Midday weekend trains may operate up to 20 minutes behind schedule, track work.  Visit metra.com for current delay times.

Metra Alert ME - Weekend trains may operate up to 15 minutes behind schedule, track work
Metra Electric weekend trains may operate up to 15 minutes behind schedule due to scheduled track work.  For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.

Metra Alert UP-W - Train #67 not operating past West Chicago. Train #69 accommodating passengers. Freight striking pedestrian

Train #67, scheduled to arrive Elburn at 10:08 PM, will not operate past West Chicago due to a freight tain sriking a pedestrian. Train #69, scheduled to arrive Elburn at 11:08 PM, will accommodate passengers. Please listen to platform announcements for the location of your train and visit metra.com for schedule information.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert UP-W - Train #70 originating from West Chicago is on the move extensively delayed, - freight train struck a pedestrian.

Train #70, scheduled to depart Elburn at 9:25 PM and arrive Ogilvie Transportation Center at 10:46 PM, originating from West Chicago is on the move extensively delay due to a freight train striking a pedestrian. Please listen to platform announcements for the location of your train and visit metra.com for schedule information.

Metra Alert MD-N - Train #2157 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 11:00 PM, delayed departure - Earlier mechanical failure
Train #2157, scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 11:00 PM, will be delayed in departure due to earlier mechanical failure. Updated information will be provided as it becomes available.
